entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
